column2: "Na Hezekia somae ma wɔkɔr Israel na Juda nyinara do
column3: na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛw nwoma so kɛmaa Efraim na Manaasɛ
column4: dɛ wɔmbra EWURADZE fie wɔ Jerusalɛm

column2: "Na ɔhen no
column3: na n’asafohemfo na mboanofo a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm nyinara faa apam
column4: dɛ wobedzi apaho no wɔ bosoom a otsia ebien no mu."

column2: "Woenntum enndzi no ne ber no mu
column3: osiandɛ nna asɔfo no nnyae nnyɛɛ hɔnho krɔnkrɔn ma wɔnndɔɔ so
column4: nkyii so ɔman no nnhyiahyiaa hɔnho nnkehyiaa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na asɛm no sɔɔ ɔhen no na mboanofo no nyinara enyi."
"Nna wɔhyɛɛ mbra pintsinn dɛ wɔmbɔ dawur wɔ Israel nyinara mu
column3: mfi Beer-seba araa nkodu Dan
column4: dɛ wɔmbra mbedzi apaho no mma EWURADZE
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no wɔ Jerusalɛm: osiandɛ nna wonndzii no nyimpa dodow kɛse dɛm yi dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no."

column2: "Nna ɔman nwoma asoafo no dze nwoma no a ofi ɔhen no na n’asafohemfo no hɔ no sii mu kɔree kekyiin Israel na Juda nyinara mu
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm no tse
column11: ma ɔno so aasan aba nkaa a wofii nsa guanee wɔ hom mu no a wofii Asiria ahemfo nsamu firii no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na mma hom nnyɛ dɛ hom egyanom
column3: na hom nuanom a wɔfoom EWURADZE
column5: ma ogyaa hɔn mu maa ɔsɛɛ

column2: "Afei mma hom nnyɛ asoɔdzenfo dɛ mbrɛ hom egyanom yɛe; mbom hom ngyaa homho mma EWURADZE
column3: na hom nkɛhɛn no krɔnkrɔnbea a ɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn daa no
column4: na hom nsom EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column5: ma n’ebufuhyew no mfi hom do mfir."

column2: "Na sɛ hom san ba EWURADZE nkyɛn a
column3: hom nuanom na hom mba benya mbɔbɔrhu wɔ hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum no enyim
column4: na wɔasan aba asaase yi do bio: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛ ɔdomfo na mbɔbɔrhufo
column5: na onnkeyi n’enyi efi hom do
column6: sɛ hom san ba ne nkyɛn a."

column2: "Nna ɔman nwoma asoafo no twaa mu fi kurow mu kɔr kurow mu dze faa Efraim na Manaasɛ man mu araa dze kodur Zebulun: na wɔseresereew hɔn
column3: na wosii hɔn atwetwe."

column2: "Naaso binom a wofi Aser na Manaasɛ na Zebulun mu brɛɛ hɔnho adze
column3: na wɔbaa Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Juda mu so Nyankopɔn ne nsa baa hɔ dɛ ɔrema hɔn akoma kor
column3: dɛ wondzi ɔhen no na asafohemfo no mbrasɛm a wɔnam EWURADZE n’asɛm do hyɛe no do."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo piinara behyiae wɔ Jerusalɛm dɛ wɔrebɛhyɛ epitsi fa no wɔ bosoom a otsia ebien no mu
column3: dɔm kɛsenara."

column2: "Na wɔsoɛree yiyii afɔrmbukyia a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no
column3: na eduhuamhyew afɔrmbukyia no nyinara so woyiyii
column4: na wɔkɔtowee guu ɔwora Kidron mu."

column2: "Nna wokunkum apaho no wɔ bosoom a otsia ebien no ne da a otsia duanan no: na asɔfo no na Levifo no enyi toe
column3: na wɔyɛɛ hɔnho krɔnkrɔn
column4: na wɔdze ɔhyew afɔr baa EWURADZE ne fie."

column2: "Na wokegyinagyinaa hɔn gyinabew wɔ hɔn kyenan do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyame nyimpa Moses mbra no tse: asɔfo no dze bɔgya no a wɔgyee no wɔ Levifo no nsamu no petsee."

column2: "Osiandɛ dodowara wɔ bagua no mu a wɔnnyɛɛ hɔnho krɔnkrɔn: dɛm ntsi Levifo no na ɔdaa hɔn do dɛ wokuku apaho no dze ma obiara a no ho nntsew
column3: ma wɔaayɛ hɔn krɔnkrɔn ama EWURADZE."

column2: "Na ɔman no mu nyimpa dodow
column3: mekyerɛ nyimpa pii
column5: Isakar na Zebulun mu ɔdodowara nntseew hɔnho
column6: naaso wokwetsiir dza wɔakyerɛw no dzii apaho no. Na Hezekia bɔɔ mpaa maa hɔn see dɛ
column7: EWURADZE pa no mfa nkyɛ obiara"

column2: "a oesiesie n’akoma dɛ ɔrohwehwɛ Nyankopɔn
column3: EWURADZE no
column5: kaansa wɔnntseew noho dɛ mbrɛ krɔnkrɔnbea ahoguar no tse mpo a."

column2: "Na EWURADZE tsiee Hezekia
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ɔman no esu."

column2: "Na Israelmba a wohun hɔn wɔ Jerusalɛm no
column3: dze enyigye kɛse hyɛɛ epitsi fa no nda esuon: na Levifo no na asɔfo dze asanku ndzɛmba dzendzen toow ndwom dze yii EWURADZE ayɛw daa daa."

column2: "Na Hezekia kasaa akomatɔyamu mu kyerɛɛ Levifo no nyinara a wonyim EWURADZE no som ho nyansa yie. Nna wodzidzii wɔ afahyɛ no ase nda esuon no
column3: wɔbobɔɔ asomdwee afɔr

column2: "Na bagua no nyina faa apam dɛ wobedzi nda esuon fofor so: na wɔdze enyigye dzii nda esuon so bio."
"Na Judahen Hezekia maa bagua no afɔrbɔdze anantwisaa apem na nguan mpemesuon; na asafohemfo no so maa bagua no anantwisaa apem na nguan mpemdu: na asɔfo dodowara yɛɛ hɔnho krɔnkrɔn."
"Na Juda bagua no nyinara
column3: nye asɔfo na Levifo no
column4: na dɔm no a wofi Israel bae no nyinara
column5: na ahɔho a wofi Israel asaase do bae no
column6: na hɔn a wɔtse Juda no

column2: "Nna enyigye kɛse baa Jerusalɛm: osiandɛ ofi Israelhen David ne ba Solomon n’aber do no
column3: ne saso mmbaa pɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Nna asɔfo na Levifo no soɛree na wohyiraa ɔman no: na wɔtsee hɔn ndze
column3: na hɔn mpaabɔ dur ne tsenabea krɔnkrɔn
